Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/Webster
ShortDescription: Northbound 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Webster, Lincoln, and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Webster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Webster, Lincoln, and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Webster.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
